name: travel-trunk
effect: Unobtainable, but allows the player to change clothes anywhere.
short_effect: Unobtainable, but allows the player to change clothes anywhere.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A light and yet incredibly effective trunk, which can contain every last piece of clothing that can be bought.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A light and yet incredibly effective trunk, which can contain every last piece of clothing that can be bought.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A light and yet incredibly effective trunk, which can contain every last piece of clothing that can be bought.
